Name: Standing Statue of Thouomun
Description: This standing statue depicts Thouomun wearing a wide wig that leaves his ears exposed. He is wearing a long kilt that hides his legs at the front. The kilt is in the shape of a trapezoid, a four-sided polygon with two parallel sides. Thouomun's arms are by his sides. His arms are so long that they reach his knees. His right hand is open and his left is closed.
